title: Suzuki–Miyaura cross-coupling of unprotected ortho-bromoanilines with benzyl, alkyl, aryl, alkenyl and heteroaromatic boronic esters
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29184-29188
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03725A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Alexandra E. Lubaev, Christopher C. Marvin, Amanda W. Dombrowski, Zafar Qureshi
An efficient Suzuki–Miyuara reaction was developed on unprotected ortho-bromoanilines providing good to excellent yields on a wide variety of substrates. The robustness of the reaction was showcased on gram scale.
